This PR makes contributing to and maintaining this project easier by eliminating the need to update and manage chapter/section numbers, numerous links, and the table of contents. This should significantly improve parallel development where contributors are adding new sections.

The intent is for development to be done in Front_Matter.tex for content before the ToC, and COBOL Programming for VSCode.md for the body. Then the following command will combine the two documents, generate the section numbers and ToC, and output COBOL Programming with VSCode.pdf for end consumers. Please see the PDF in this PR.
pandoc "COBOL Programming with VSCode.md" -o "COBOL Programming with VSCode.pdf" --number-sections --toc -B Front_Matter.tex --listings

Covers all aspects of the download and installation of Zowe CLI and Zowe CLI plug-ins.



This PR also addresses issue #24.
